title: What are the consequences of not attending Lab?
content: I'm in Physics Cycle and the lab assistant just marks the attendance on a piece of paper and it does'nt get reflected onto the PESU app. Just wanted to know that will I be debared from giving my Physics ESA? I already have a good attendance in Physics.Thanks.

comments.body: It will be counted. I personally experienced getting busted. Attend lab, maintain 85% attendance for that and get ur record corrected on time, it matters for ur internals. Otherwise u can get summoned by the HOD and things can get messy if u want to make up for lost time. U can get debarred from writing ur ESA.
Ahhh  PESU.. Memories... What a waste of time engineering was.. Everyone gonna go into It anyway...
